alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 02 at 3:51AM PST until December 05 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT ABOVE 7000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 4 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of two to four feet conceivable above 8,000 feet. Snowfall of one to two feet possible from 7,000 feet to 8,000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph along the crest and through canyons. * WHERE...Southern Sierra Nevada. * WHEN...From this evening through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
